name: doggishly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is like a dog: The servants were doggishly faithful to their master. The members of the club are doggishly loyal, and none of them would agree to speak to the press. Related words
doggish
dog noun
More examplesFewer examplesShe seemed doggishly faithful, like a dumb animal.He plodded along doggishly beside me until we reached the farm.The boy sat on his chair looking doggishly at his mother.He gave no answer, but merely growled doggishly.I hope you will not forget your manners and act doggishly.
